data.message: I could use a little love from Facebook! I have 2500 fans on our fan page - I can only invite 425 to any given event - what's up with that? They are my fans - not yours? Once you cut me off I get a pop-up telling me to advertise - to my own fans? If you want to really help me contact me - no trite marketing paste & copy relies -

replies.message: Hey Jim. Events with large invite lists often get reported as spam, so we limit the number of people any one person can invite to 500 invites per event. This is described in more detail here: http://bit.ly/2e8PFmB. There are several other ways to let people know about upcoming events, which you can learn about here: http://bit.ly/2elrQ6a. Hope this helps! -Nick
